Title: Relates to providing that health maintenance organizations shall provide market access to diagnostic laboratories
Summary: Provides that health maintenance organizations shall provide market access to diagnostic laboratories.
LawCode: Amd §§4406 & 4406-c, Pub Health L; amd §4804, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the insurance law, in relation to providing access to diagnostic laboratories by patients in health maintenance organizations
